body: Part 2: But once that they exit the theme park they return to normal as if nothing happened in the theme park. The married women have sex with many guys but still loves her family and husband, it's just their way of escapism, letting loose. Same with Kazuya and Rinko's case here, they love each other, it's just that Rinko became addicted to sex with Minoru that he's the only guy who can satisfy her. Though Rinko, Masaki and Minoru is shit for doing that to Kazuya. Cut Kazuya some slack it's not his fault, why? I mean page 9 and 10 says it, Minoru forced himself on Rinko. Rinko became addicted end of story. So why blame Kazuya for being a simp cuck, I mean I get why but just cut him some slack.

We all know that yasu's (author) characters are known to be dense, stupid, simp cucks. But I'll try to defend the MC Kazuya (the guy who became the husband of the heroine) just because I kinda have sympathy for him after reading it a second time. The MC (Kazuya) in this is not as dense as people think, let me explain, in page 9 Masaki (the busty girl) explained as to why they had a gathering, meaning Kazuya will literally confess if he just didn't passed out after drinking. Next evidence, page 17, why did Kazuya refuse Masaki's offer? It's just his morals acting up, he don't want to have sex with someone other than his lover or with Rinko, after he confessed. Third evidence, why did both Rinko and Kazuya ended up getting married? Well the explanation I can only give is, you know Mizuryu Kei's Oideyo Mizuryuu Kei Land series right? It's just like that with the married women that comes to the theme park where they have families and husbands but still have sex with many guys. Part 1 End
I tired of yasu's MC tropes, it's always the same. Atleast make another Kotaro, that MC atleast is different than his other MCs
@Kamui67 welcome to hentai where barely any hentai makes sense except the vanilla ones
